      Subclasses of Weapon in <Unnamed> 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Handgun
      Represents a moderately powerful weapon that is an upgrade of TrashPistol
      class  Minigun
      Represents a minigun, the best weapon in the game
      class  Shotgun
      Represents a powerful weapon that has a long cool down
      class  TrashPistol
      Represents the weakest weapon available
